name: Hack-IT (Daniel, CyberFreak44)
description:
Hack-IT has been created for the FH Hagenberg 2022 game jam where we were awarded with the first place.
This game has been created by a team of 5 over one weekend.
The team consists of 2 programmers, 2 art and content creators and 1 audio specialist.
If you like the music in the game please feel free to check out more sound tracks on the YouTube channel of our audio specialist (@CyberFreak44 Music).

Story

You are a mercenary with the profession of hacking. Your goal is to gather as much intel as possible for your clients.

Features
  • Unique experience thanks to procedural generated levels
  • Upgrade your PC to get stronger
  • Select your job from a wide range of available contracts
  • Upgrade your GPU to level 10 or higher and turn RGB mode ON for a more colorful experience (Photosensitivity / seizure warning!)
  • Fight different types of enemies
  • Open doors and hack terminals by standing near them
  • Fancy music
Controls
  • W, A, S, D - Move around
  • Mouse - Aim at your targets
  • Left mouse button - Shoot a bullet
